Status settings: Please set up a project in the merchant menu of SOFORT AG (please make sure to create a 'SOFORT Gateway Project'). In the next step, you just need your configuration key
Impostazioni dello stato: "Imposta un progetto nell'area utenti di SOFORT AG (fate attenzione a creare un 'progetto SOFORT Gateway'). Nel passo successivo occorre solo la chiave di configurazione"

Status settings: In order to offer SOFORT Banking, you need a customer account with SOFORT AG. You are not a customer yet? Register now!
Impostazioni dello stato: "Per poter offrire SOFORT Banking le occorre un conto cliente con SOFORT AG. Non sei ancora cliente? Registrati ora!"

Status settings: Just a few steps are required to use SOFORT Banking:
Impostazioni dello stato: "Per poter utilizzare SOFORT Banking sono necessari alcuni passi:"

Status settings: SOFORT Banking is the direct payment system provided by SOFORT AG. SOFORT Banking allows buyers to make a wire transfer of the respective amount during the order process using their online banking account. You as a merchant will receive a real-time confirmation after the SOFORT Banking transaction has been completed. This enables you to immediately ship goods on stock and digital goods - and the buyer will receive the purchased items faster. Learn more about SOFORT Banking and SOFORT AG at sofort.com
Impostazioni dello stato: "SOFORT Banking è il procedimento di bonifico diretto di SOFORT AG. Con SOFORT Banking gli acquirenti impostano comodamente un bonifico per il relativo importo nel loro conto di home banking ancora durante l'ordine. A conclusione del bonifico
column3: Lei come commerciante riceve la conferma in tempo reale. In tal modo può inviare subito la merce in deposito e i beni digitali - e il cliente riceve gli acquisti più velocemente. Maggiori informazioni relative a SOFORT Banking e SOFORT AG su sofort.com"

Status settings:
• Payment system with data protection certified by TÜV Saarland
  • No registration required
  • Stock goods/content can be shipped/activated immediately
  • Please have your online banking details ready
Impostazioni dello stato:
"
  • Sistema di pagamento con protezione dati verificata da TÜV Saarland (ente tedesco di certificazione)
  • Senza alcuna registrazione
  • Merci e beni digitali
column4:
possono essere inviati/attivati immediatamente
  • Tieni pronti i tuoi dati di home banking (dati d'accesso/password dispositiva)

Status settings: Buyer protection for payment by SOFORT Banking! More information.
Impostazioni dello stato: Pagando con SOFORT Banking gode della protezione acquirenti! Ulteriori informazioni.

Status settings: Only your configuration key will be needed in the next steps.
Impostazioni dello stato: A következő lepésnél csupán a konfigurációs kulcsrára van szüksége.

Status settings: Activate the module and enter the configuration key. SOFORT Banking will be immediately available in your checkout. Additional settings are not required.
Impostazioni dello stato: Egyszerűen aktiválja a modult és adja meg a konfigurációs kulcsot. A SOFORT Banking azonnal rendelkezésére áll a Checkout-jában. További beállításokra nincs szükség.

Status settings: Activate SOFORT Banking in your shop
Impostazioni dello stato: Aktiválja a SOFORT Bankinget a webáruházában
Használja a Main Website (Fő weboldal) beállítását

Status settings: Adjust the SOFORT Banking module properties here. (Click to open)
Impostazioni dello stato: Itt állíthatja be a SOFORT Banking moduljának a vislekedését. (Kattintson a megnyitáshoz)

Status settings: Please bear in mind that to offer buyer protection to your customers you will need a SOFORT Bank account and activate the feature buyer protection in your project settings
Impostazioni dello stato: Kérjük, vegye figyelembe, hogy a vásárlónak nyújtandó vásárlóvédelem érdekében rendelkeznie kell SOFORT Bank bankszámlával, valamint a vásárlóvédelmet aktiválnia kell a projektbeállításoknál.

Status settings:
The following placeholders are allowed:
  • Order number: {{orderid}}
  • Customer name: {{name}}
  • Date: {{date}}
  • Shop name: {{shopname}}
  • Transaction: {{transaction}}

Please adjust these settings only if you are familiar with status handling of Magento, as this may have unpredictable effects on your shop and other modules might no longer work properly. Additional information can be found in our manual.
Impostazioni dello stato: Kérjük, csak akkor változtasson ezen a beállításon, ha ismeri a Magento státuszkezelését, mivel ez előre nem látható következményekkel járhat a webáruházára nézve, valamint más modulok esetlegesen nem működnek majd megfelelően. További felvilágosítást kézikönyvünkben talál.

Status settings: Define the status for orders which have not been paid yet.
Impostazioni dello stato: (Definiálja azon megrendelések státuszát, melyek még nem kerültek kifizetésre.)

Status settings: Define the status for orders which have been successfully completed by SOFORT Banking.
Impostazioni dello stato: (Definiálja azon megrendelések státuszát, melyek SOFORT Bankinggel eredményesen lezárultak.)
Megrendelési státusz a teljes megtérítés érdekében:

Status settings: Define the status for orders which have been prepared for full refunds in the SOFORT AG merchant menu. Bear in mind that refunds usually have to be carried out manually.
Impostazioni dello stato: Definiálja azon megrendelések státuszát, melyek a felhasználói felületen teljes egészében stornóra kerültek előjegyzésre. Vegye figyelembe, hogy a stornókat általában saját kezűleg kell végrehajtani.

Status settings: (Define the status of orders for which payment has been received on your SOFORT Bank account. A SOFORT Bank account is required.)
Impostazioni dello stato: (Definiálja azon megrendelések státuszát, melyekkel kapcsolatban SOFORT Bank bankszámláján fizetés tapasztalható. SOFORT Bank bankszámla szükséges.)

Status settings: (Define the status of orders for which no payment or a different amount has been received on your SOFORT Bank account. A SOFORT Bank account is required.)
Impostazioni dello stato: (Definiálja azon megrendelések státuszát, melyeknél nem tapasztalható fizetés vagy eltérő összeg érkezett a SOFORT Bank bankszámlájára. SOFORT Bank bankszámla szükséges.)

Status settings: Internal transaction ID of SOFORT AG: %s (please specify for support requests).
Impostazioni dello stato: A SOFORT AG belső tranzakciós azonosítója: %s (kérjük, adja meg, ha megkeresi az ügyfélszolgálatot).

Status settings: Redirection to SOFORT Banking. Transaction not finished. Transaction ID: [[transaction_id]]. Time: [[date]]
Impostazioni dello stato: Továbbítás a SOFORT Bankinghez. A fizetés még nincs lezárva. Tranzakciós azonosító: [[transaction_id]]. Idő: [[date]] óra

Status settings: SOFORT Banking has been completed successfully - Transaction ID: [[transaction_id]]. Time: [[date]]
Impostazioni dello stato: A SOFORT Banking sikeresen lezárva - Tranzakciós azonosító: [[transaction_id]]. Idő: [[date]] óra

Status settings: The payment has not been received on your SOFORT Bank account. Please verify the payment. Time: [[date]]
Impostazioni dello stato: A kifizetés nem érkezett meg a SOFORT Bank bankszámlára. Kérjük, ellenőrizze a fizetést. Idő: [[date]] óra

Status settings: The payment has been received on your SOFORT Bank account. Time: [[date]]
Impostazioni dello stato: Az összeg beérkezett a SOFORT Bank bankszámlára, idő: [[date]] óra

Status settings: An amount differing from the order has been received on your SOFORT Bank account. Please verify the payment. Time: [[date]]
Impostazioni dello stato: A megrendeléstől eltérő összeg érkezett a SOFORT Bank bankszámlára. Kérjük, ellenőrizze a fizetést. Idő: [[date]] óra

Status settings: Partial amount will be refunded - [[refunded_amount]]. Time: [[date]]
It is not recommended to change this setting
The receipt of the money ( can be only detected with an account with SOFORT Bank)
Impostazioni dello stato: A ricezione dell'importo (può essere accertato solo con un conto con SOFORT Bank)

Status settings: If the status shouldn't be updated for this event, please choose as status %s
Impostazioni dello stato: Se lo stato di questo evento non deve essere attualizzato, selezioni lo stato %s

Status settings: A credit memo will be created automatically if a transaction was refunded by using the SOFORT panel.
Impostazioni dello stato: Viene creato automaticamente un accredito se una transazione è stata rimborsata nel sistema SOFORT.

Status settings: Redirection to SOFORT Banking. Transaction not finished. Transaction ID: [[transaction_id]]. Time: [[date]]
Impostazioni dello stato: "Inoltro a SOFORT Banking. Pagamento non ancora terminato. ID transazione: [[transaction_id]]. Data e ora: [[date]]"
